text: "Tears" is a 1976 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush. It is the fifth track from their fourth studio album 2112. It was covered by Alice in Chains in 2016 and was released as a single and their cover appeared on Rush's 40th anniversary edition of their fourth studio album. ==References== Category:1976 songs Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Alice in Chains songs
title: Tears (Rush song)
